description:
The owner of this Badge prove true Trading and Collecting skills. He collected a fully Regular, Community Hero and Special Edition Deck. Also he was under the first 5 people which did this.

Following will be checked by me before accept the Award:
Regular Deck 100/100 Cards (Alternatively a Regular Collectors Card)
## +
Community Hero Deck 10/10 Cards  (Alternatively a Trading Collectors Card)
## +
Special Edition Deck 20/20 Cards
## =
Hardcore Collector
name: Hardcore Collector
